column3: Initial project setup and analysis of the requirements
Created Table and Robot classes. Thought more about how to best represent robot heading and location.
Finalised Table and Robot classes. Commenced work on Commands.
Refactor Robot.Heading to normalise to the range 0 - 359.
Create simulation context & refactor robot in command.
Refactoring. Creating tests for examples in The Challenge. Developed regex.
Researched how parsing and lexing and considered how to best integrate parsing a collection of commands AND provide an meaniful an error message! Settled on using a static methodthe like int
Initial work on the command interpreter code.
Agnosied over variable names and wording for internal documentation for the lexing and parsing code.
Moving forward. Completed parsing code and added a ton of unit tests.
Finalised command interpreter code. Commenced work on console application.
Brought console application to a runnable state.
